job description:
Job Title: Data Analyst Project Assistant

Department: Operations

Reports To: Director of Operations

FLSA Status: Non-Exempt

Job Code: Admin II

Summary: Assists Systems Data Analyst in executing all agency management system conversions. Will work with AssuredPartners Conversion team to ensure a successful conversion process from original source systems to converting management system.
  • Ability to assist in executing mapping between source systems to converting new system in Excel documents.
  • Capacity to review data sets from reports for trends, cleanup needs, and system configuration at the direction of the System Data Analyst for each conversion project.
  • Assist in importing data from original source system to templates to successfully complete “manual” conversion imports into converting system via SQL server applications.
  • Document and understand the reasoning for documenting aspects of prior source system configure, Data Analysts review of system applications, and all workflows performed by the team.
  • Scrub reports for cleanup to converting system both pre and post conversion with Systems Data Analyst.
  • Learn and become an assisting resource for reporting functionality source systems such as Epic, AMS360, TAM, and Sagitta.
To perform this job successfully, an individual must be able to perform each essential duty satisfactorily. The requirements listed below are representative of the knowledge, skill, and/or ability required. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.

Education and/or Experience

Bachelor's degree (B. A.) from four-year college or university and/or Minimum of 3-5 years insurance experience; Insurance data conversion experience preferred and/or proficient Excel knowledge.

Note: To apply for this job, submit your application by clicking on the Apply Now button on this page
